revised_title: The Role of Application Programmers in Harnessing Multiprocessor Systems
tldr: The discussion highlights the need for a change in attitude among computer scientists and conventional scientists to effectively utilize multiprocessor systems. It emphasizes the role of application programmers in load balancing and optimizing performance on parallel computers. The author also notes that the lack of progress in run-time load balancing and the limited transferability of principles across application areas and computer designs may limit the extent of parallel programming.
